name: Beast Frenzy
description:
School: Northern hedge magic

The targeted animal immediately enters a frenzied berserker state and their Strength and Body attributes are raised by Magnitude. They will attack the nearest target not of their same species. The caster is the least prioritized target but not safe.

name: Boulder Throw
description:
School: -

Must be cast in an area either with earhern ground or with readily available rocks. The caster levitates and  launches rocks towards the target. The base damage is based on the size of the rocks. The caster can decide to either target a specific target or ro rain rocks down on a whole targeted area. The damage the spell can do depends on the terrain.

name: Dancing Blade
description:
School: Royal Parow

The caster animates the target item to fight for them for the duration of the spell. The caster can device whom the dancing blade targets, otherwise the dancing blade acts autonomously and attacks the casters enemies  with a skill roll of 7 + Magnitude and a Strength score of 2+ Magnitude. Max size of the targeted item is 3 + Magnitude. It does the same damage as if wielded by someone with the before mentioned strength.

name: Fire Bird
description:
School: Royal Parow

Once cast the bird of fire attacks the target by itself, with an ranged attack roll of 8 + Casters Magnitude. On a hit it does 4 + Magnitude d E damage, fire aspected. Caster may command the bird to strike any particular body part on the target.

name: Gillian's Cloak of the Night
description:
School: Savant Order

This lesser known spell of Gillian wraps the caster in a dark shroud that hides their identity when looked upon from far. Any onlooker more than a few meters away(adjacent zone or further), sees only a hooded figure of approximate size without any personal signifiers. When near any onlooker sees the true visage of the caster below the shroud. The spell is dispelled by sunlight.

name: Gillian's Topographic Map
description:
School: Savant Order

The caster, standing outside, or at least in an large open area with a very high ceiling, projects local topography onto a holographic map, which after the initial casting functions similar to Gillian´s holographic map. The initial casting sends a light sprite high up in the air which can be visible from great distances. The initial map reaches a kilometer in each direction.

name: Ghastly Visage
description:
School: "Southern"/Volar

The casters' very presence becomes horrifying to onlookers. The caster may choose to exclude allies from the effects of the spell when casting. For those affected by the spell the caster counts as having Magnitude levels of terror. The effect of the spell follows sympathetic rules, meaning the casters casting roll must overcome the magic resistance of the individuals affected.

The spell effect counts as an illusion.

name: Glyph: Fire
description:
School: -

The caster inscribes a magical glyph in an area. The glyph is only visible by the caster and anyone with Mage sight, Aura vision or similar type of magic sight ability. The glyph can either “cover” the whole area or one larger object such as a door or chest. If the area is entered or the object is disturbed the glyph explodes in a ball of fire, any everyone in the area is hit with a 2 + (Magnitude*2) E d vitality damage, fire type.

name: Glyph: Frost
description:
School: -

The caster inscribes a magical glyph in an area. The glyph is only visible by the caster and anyone with Mage sight, Aura vision or similar type of magic sight ability. The glyph can either “cover” the whole area or one larger object such as a door or chest. If the area is entered or the object is disturbed the glyph explodes in a cloud of supercooled air, anyone in the area is hit with a 2 + (Magnitude) E d vitality damage, cold type, and instantly becomes chilled or frozen.

name: Glyph: Holding
description:
School: -

The caster inscribes a magical glyph in an area. The glyph is only visible by the caster and anyone with Mage sight, Aura vision or similar type of magic sight ability. The glyph can either “cover” the whole area or one larger object such as a door or chest. If the area is entered or the object is disturbed the glyph everyone is subject to a Strength Save vs. 10+Magnitude. On a failure they become incapable of any movement or action for a duration of rounds equal to their margin of failure.

name: Guardian Stones
description:
School: Northern hedge magic

The caster summons a number of guardian stones equal to spent mana that start to hover above their head. If the caster is attacked a stone will try to block the attack with a roll of 8+Magnitude, success or not the stone is spent. The caster may also on their turn fire the stones as ranged attacks using the Spell attack skill + Dexterity, on a hit it does 4d P damage. They may fire how many stones they have in any one attack, each additional stone spent increases the rate of fire by one, and the attack has a size of 2 for purposes of hitting with multiple projectiles.

name: Hypnotize
description:
School: Northern hedge magic

The target becomes unable to take any action. The effect lasts as long as the caster concentrates(is not interrupted or decides to perform another action) and maintains sight of the target.

name: Murgot's Rest
description:
School: Savant order

This spell summons a small magical tent in the target area. The area should have mostly flat ground for the spell to work properly. As a start it summons the equivalent of a small tent. Every point of Magnitude can be divided on the following upgrades: Comfort, Cooling,  Insulation, Heating, Visual flair, and Size.

name: Nova
description:
School: Royal Parow

Manifest a powerful blast in the targeted area. Caster rolls spell attack to hit and everyone in the area gets to defend themself however they want. Everyone hit takes 2*Magnitude B d damage.

name: Soldier on (O Brave Warriors of the North)
description:
School: Northern hedge magic

Any allies in the targeted area can ignore penalties from Vitality damage and receive 1 point  armor for the duration of the spell.
